values: 气球；热气球；膨胀物；（漫画中的）对话框；膨胀的经济（或市场）；（贷款或保险的）大额一次性支付；（汽车或其他交通工具的）安全气囊
迅速增加；突然膨胀；涨大；鼓起；乘坐热气球飞行；打出高远球
膨胀的；球形的；气球状的

synonym.mean: 使像气球般鼓起；使激增

sample.mean: n. 漫画；讽刺画；幽默画；动画电影；动画片；卡通片；草图；底图；连环漫画；简略说法

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"人或物"

word_group.brief_definition: 试行方案；试探性的言语
最后一笔大数额偿付款

word_group.phrase: go down like a lead balloon
go over like a lead balloon

bilingual.source: There are too many people in that balloon!
Place the blown-up balloon in an empty bowl.
bilingual.target: 将吹起的气球放在一个空碗里。

bilingual.source: The balloon's envelope is made of very strong nylon.
bilingual.target: 气球的外壳由非常坚固的尼龙制成。

bilingual.source: Hot air is lighter than cool air, so a balloon rises when the air inside it is heated.
bilingual.target: 热空气比冷空气轻，所以当气球内的空气被加热时，气球会上升。

bilingual.source: It is even possible to fly over the Egyptian pyramids in a balloon.
bilingual.target: 甚至可以乘坐气球飞越埃及金字塔。

bilingual.source: A balloon will go higher or lower depending on how much gas is burned.
bilingual.target: 气球的升降取决于燃烧了多少气体。

bilingual.source: While the balloon is up, somebody follows it with a car and trailer.
bilingual.target: 当气球升空时，有人会用汽车和拖车跟随。

list.abstract: Balloon（ [bəˈluːn]），英语单词，作名词用，为气球；热气球；球形大酒杯。作动词用，为鼓起；成球状突起；被踢得腾空飞起用。作形容词用，为气球状的。短语搭配有hot air balloon（热气球）。例句为“Scientists tried to send a balloon to Venus.（科学家试图发射一个气球到金星）”。 Balloon不及物动词类近义词有surge、sharp rise，及物动词类近义词有proliferate，复数为 balloons。

yingyinNormal.en: George loves his dinosaur balloon. Everyone loves George's dinosaur balloon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治喜欢他的恐龙气球。大家都喜欢乔治的恐龙气球。

yingyinNormal.en: George loves his dinosaur balloon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治喜欢恐龙气球。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig has made a balloon dinosaur. Dine-saw.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸真的做了一只恐龙气球。恐龙。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't you pop it, Polly. George loves his balloon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要把它戳破了，波利。乔治喜欢他的气球。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? Oh George, in the world there are two sorts of balloons, the up balloon and the down balloon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？哦，乔治，这个世界上有两种气球，往上飞的气球和往下掉的气球。

yingyinNormal.en: Your balloon will be safe in here. Hello Polly, George has gotten an new balloon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的气球这这里很安全。你好，波利，乔治有一个新气球。

yingyinNormal.en: Here is Mr. Fox. These all look very interesting. Balloons, lovely balloons. Would you like a balloon, Madame Gazelle?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是狐狸先生。这些看着好有意思。气球，可爱的气球。羚羊夫人，你要一个气球吗？

yingyinNormal.en: There you go George. Hold it tight, don't let go. George has let go of the balloon. Maybe I'll hold this very valuable balloon for the journey home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你，乔治。抓紧了，不要让他飞走了。乔治让气球飞走了。也许回家的路上，我要好好抓住这个值钱的气球。

yingyinNormal.en: George has got Polly's birdseed. George. That is too much birdseed. Polly will grow very big and burst like a balloon. Pop. Burst like a balloon. Pop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治给波莉倒了鸟食。乔治！你倒得太多的鸟食啦。波莉吃了会长很大，然后像气球一样爆炸！像气球一样爆炸。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I have an elephant balloon? Please. Here you are, Peppa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 能不能给我一个大象气球？好的，给你佩琪。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe we can get you a dinosaur balloon. Are you sure they have dinosaur balloons, Daddy Pig? I'm certain of it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许，我们可以给你找个恐龙气球。你能确定他们有恐龙气球吗，猪爸爸？我当然能确定。

yingyinNormal.en: George, your balloon is going to the moon. You'll never see it again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治，你的气球要去月球了。你再也看不见它了。

yingyinNormal.en: We bought George a dinosaur balloon. But George let it go and it's flying to the moon. There must be some way we can get it back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们给乔治买了个恐龙气球。但是乔治松手了，气球就飞到月球上去了。肯定办法把它找回来。

yingyinNormal.en: Most important of all, we need a dinosaur balloon for George. Oh, dear, I do not seem to have any dinosaur balloons. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有最重要的事，我们还要给乔治一个恐龙气球。噢天呐，真的很抱歉，我这里好像没有恐龙气球。噢。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't think they have dinosaur ice cream. I think George wants a dinosaur balloon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得他们没有恐龙冰淇淋。我觉得乔治想要恐龙气球。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you little tigers want to do next? Dine-Saw. That's right. We have to find George a dinosaur balloon. Let's get you all balloons. Hurray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那接下来，你们想做什么呢？恐龙。说得没错，我们要帮乔治找到恐龙气球。你们每一个都有气球。好棒。

yingyinNormal.en: How much is the little balloon? Ten dollars. Ten dollars? It's all for good cause.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，这个小气球多少钱？十美元。十美元？都是为了做善事的。

yingyinNormal.en: Polly Parrot has rescued George's balloon. Hooray. Who's a clever Polly. Who's a clever Polly. George, don't let go of your balloon again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鹦鹉波利抓到了乔治的气球！好诶。好聪明的波利！好聪明的波利！乔治，这回不要再松手了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if we don't do our jobs. What is your job exactly? Besides making balloon animals.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们不能尽职的话。你的职责究竟是什么？除了捏气球动物。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. After all we weigh it down, we could walk it right over there. Like a parade balloon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，毕竟我们把它拉下来了，我们可以从那儿走过去，就像游行气球一样。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 气球; 像气球一样鼓起

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 气球; 像气球一样鼓起

examination_example.sentence: Scientists tried to send a <highlight>balloon</highlight> to Venus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家试图发射一个气球到金星。

examination_example.sentence: It told of how scientists rode a <highlight>balloon</highlight> to an altitude of 80,000 feet to make telescope observations of Venus's atmosphere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它讲述了科学家如何乘坐气球到达80000英尺的高度，用望远镜观察金星的大气层。

sense_info_list.en: quickly increase in size, weight, or importance

examination_example.sentence: By World War Ⅱ, Coke bottle sales had <highlight>ballooned</highlight> into billions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到第二次世界大战(Ⅱ)时，可口可乐的瓶装销售额已飙升至数十亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: The video gaming industry has <highlight>ballooned</highlight> in recent years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来，电子游戏行业迅速发展。

word_usage.usage: balloon的意思是“气球”，可指玩具气球或装饰性气球，还可指可乘坐的热气球。“乘气球”可用 in a balloon 表示。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I've always wanted to go up in a hot air <highlight>balloon</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我一直想坐热气球飞上去。

examination_example.sentence: Here I am on top of Mount Fuji, and here I am in a hot air <highlight>balloon</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在富士山的山顶上，坐在热气球里。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 气球；热气球；球形大酒杯；蠢人；气球形圆框

sense_info_list.zh: 气球; 像气球一样鼓起

examination_example.sentence: Grown-ups and children were amazed and joyful during the <highlight>balloon</highlight> festival.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在气球节期间，大人和孩子们都感到惊喜和愉快。

examination_example.sentence: The manager asked everyone to pick a <highlight>balloon</highlight> and blow it up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经理让每个人拿起一个气球，然后把气球吹起来。

examination_example.sentence: When the lanterns are lit, they slowly rise into the air like small hot-air <highlight>balloons</highlight> for all to see.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当灯笼点亮时，它们像小热气球一样慢慢升到空中，让所有人都能看到。
